full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDOM TSIG SUM BCU PA DANG 'DI'I 'GREL PA SKAL MNYAM BYIS PA'I ROL RTZED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES RNAM 'GREL YIG CHA'I SDOM TSIGS SUM CU PA'I 'GREL PA SKAL MNYAM BYIS PA'I ROL RTZED CES BYA BA 'DI @034A *, ,NI BSTAN PA LA GANG PHAN GYI RNAM MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I GROGS BZANG DKA' BCU BLO BZANG RDO RJES RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I 'KHOR LO LHA DAR SRID DU RING BA BCAS NAN CHEN POS BSKUL NGOR, ^ RIGS SMRA YONGS KYI THA SHAL RDO BCAL RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MING BTAGS 'DZIN PA PAN RGAN SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GANG YIG BRIS SHES PA RNAMS SO, ,)
